content: It’s simple: exhale is here to help you be well. Add wellbeing to your travels with a calming spa experience or an inspiring fitness class at exhale, the ultimate wellbeing sanctuary located on the third floor. Through a balanced combination of results-oriented spa therapies (massages, facials, acupuncture, waxing) and high-quality fitness classes (barre, cardio, yoga, HIIT), exhale provides the answer to a stronger, healthier, better version of you – wherever your travels take you.
